Class Utils.List.Event

All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
Utils.List
public static class Utils.List.Event
extends EventObject

This Event is passed to Listeners of List when its contents change.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int ADD
          An option for action(), indicating an addition to the corresponding List.
static int REMOVE
          An option for action(), indicating a removal from the corresponding List.
 
Method Summary
 int action()
          Return the action this Event is reporting: one of ADD, REMOVE.
 int index()
          The index at which the associated action took place.
 Object subject()
          Returns the object that was added or removed (per action()).
 String toString()
          Vague description of this event.
